activities: Applicant Insight, Inc. is a National Association of Professional Background Screeners (NAPBS) accredited consumer reporting agency as defined by the Fair Credit Reporting Act that provides background screening solutions to regulated and non-regulated employers and entities through a comprehensive suite of industry approved services.  Information received is limited only to what is required to conduct thorough and accurate searches related to criminal history, motor vehicle records, credit history, verification services, drug testing, and other related screening components.  Information is processed both electronically and manually.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resource and Employment Screening Data (Manual and Electronic)
recoursemech: Applicant Insight agrees to cooperate with the Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) located in Switzerland or their respective authorized agents/representatives.
